response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our top-of-the-line product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed all expectations. It is not just an object; it's a symbol of excellence and innovation. Given its unparalleled quality and unique features, I believe its true value surpasses $10,000. Considering its immense worth, I am offering you the opportunity to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $15,000. This exclusive offer is tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for premium products. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can bring this extraordinary piece into your collection. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for your time and interest.", "product_price": 15000}
